title: Pre-Ascension Azir?
body:
I really like the way he looks in the Shurima video. Would it actually possible to see this skin in the future? And it would be cool if his face was covered by a shadow with eyes glowing too. We have a Pre-Void Kassa, so Pre-Ascension Azir won't harm anyone :3
https://31.media.tumblr.com/b7e2d19bbcb93285b326efbadd2a3c30/tumblr_inline_nc04fbYKpZ1t01pb2.jpg
http://img1.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20140917024100/leagueoflegends/images/f/f2/Azir_Ascension_1.png

replies.body: then we need a pre-ascencion Renekton, Nasus, and of course, Xerath.
Pre ascension Xerath would just be an old man hobbling around showing off his bag of magic tricks.

Well, we actually don't know how old Xerath was when this all happened, only that he was older then Azir.

Hell, Xerath could have been in his 30s or 40s and not really be that old.  And even then, I think it would be kinda cool having a guy with a beard and fancy robes (or whatever type of clothing that Xerath would wear for his position).

At the very least the skin would be a 1350 skin, and it has some pretty strong potential to be a legendary (1850) skin.

Things you could do with it would be:

New walking animations
New Taunt
New Joke
New Recall animation
New casting animations for all his spells.
Possible some new particle effects (if anything they would probably change the particles for his ult slightly, however if you all have any ideas for some new particle effects go ahead and shout em out.)
And of course a new voiceover.
I seem remember Xerath having grown up alongside Azir, as if they were brothers. Or something like that.

In his lore he called Azir a "spoiled, self-obsessed boy".
One of his taunts calls Azir a boy as well.

Makes me indirectly think that Xerath's probably some older guy~
